mapper.update: UPDATE AF SET AF_KEYNAME = #{keyname}, AF_NAME = #{name}, AF_SIZE = #{size}, AF_ORDER = #{order}, AF_PATH = #{path} WHERE AF_BNO = #{bno}
mapper.select: SELECT AF_BNO AS "bno",AF_KEYNAME AS "keyname",AF_NAME AS "name",AF_SIZE AS "size",AF_ORDER AS "order",AF_PATH AS "path" FROM AF WHERE AF_BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY "order"
